    • Method Detail

      • process

        protected boolean process()
                   throws XmlPatcherWorkerException
        Get all script entities inside apply entity and invoke workers for them. If any of the workers fail, then then entire apply entity fails
        Specified by:
        process in class XmlPatcherWorker<Patch,java.lang.Object>
        Returns:
        true if job was success

        XmlPatcherWorkerException
